tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Both Dr. Bushra and Dr. Varoon diagnosed the issue very well and then took time with me to walk me through further course of action and possible procedures with their pros and cons and made me comfortable. Highly recommend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had a wonderful experience at Smilesutra Clinic with Dr. Varoon Jain. During my treatment, I was going for my first international trip, but my braces were making me anxious about how my pictures are going to look. At one appointment, I became emotional when I learned there was more to be done with my progress . Dr. Varoon Jain patiently consoled me, explaining the importance of waiting for optimal results. In the end, I was thrilled with the outcome, and looking back, I regretted my initial impatience. Dr. Varoon is truly the best, providing not just excellent dental care but also compassionate support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: On my first visit with Dr.Varoon Jain, I was impressed by the explanation and the options to choose for undergoing my dental treatment.  He has a pleasant personality and is young and energetic. He is friendly and kind by nature in his talk with the patients.  He treats the patients with utmost care and like a family member. The staff at his office is equally cooperative and very kind and friendly with the patients. His office has very good ambience and all the required facilities are provided. He has taken great care by calling me at the appropriate interval for the treatment of my implant of my teeth for the whole mouth.  He finishes the final treatment only till he and the patient is satisfied.  I am very happy with the treatment I have undergone under him. Would suggest one must consult him for better result of the teeth replacement. His Co-workers are equally experienced and ready to help the patient.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I never had braces as a kid but as I got older I became more interested in straightening my teeth. I have seen many different orthodontists for consults, but I never felt comfortable starting treatment and actually getting the braces until I met Dr. Varun Jain. 
I have been pleased with his kindness and professionalism, He took the time in the beginning to help me make the choice of which braces to try and made sure I was comfortable with my choice and the process every step of the way. I have braces for about 8 months now and I’m loving the results so far. I highly recommend Dr Varun to everyone who may be unhappy with his/her smile.
reply_text:

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I must admit that I wasn't very comfortable to undergo my dental implant initially but Dr. Varoon was very good in explaining why it was necessary in my case and also explained me the procedure in detail.
He aslo assured me that it was a regular procedure and assured me of a painless treatment as well..

I was completely satisfied and decided to go ahead with the procedure..
Few regulatory blood tests before the implant and got an appointment for the very next day...

The dental implant went pitch perfect and I hardly had any pain during or after the procedure..

Today is my third day after the implant and I am very happy as I have no pain, I can eat normally and now just waiting to get the healing so I can have a cap soon...

Kudos to Dr. Varoon and smile sutra team..
You guys rock..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had a couple of cavities in my wisdom tooth which is buccally placed. Dr. Aditi Jain treated me in a very professional manner and removed the decay in the tooth and filled the cavity with a GIC tooth filling. 

The entire process took about 30 mins. I am thankful to the Smilesutra Team and Dr. Aditi Jain in particular for having done my treatment without me feeling any pains which I was initially apprehensive about. 

I would recommend everyone to Smilesutra for any of your dental problems. All the doctors are friendly and explain the issues in layman language and resolve them without any hassles.
